akn:section.akn:heading: Assistance to provide safe water, sanitation, and hygiene

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Purposes The purposes of assistance authorized by this section are—

(b) Authorization To carry out the purposes of subsection (a), the President is authorized to furnish assistance for programs in developing countries to provide affordable and equitable access to safe water, sanitation, and hygiene.
(c) Activities supported Assistance provided under subsection (b) shall, to the maximum extent practicable, be used to—

(d) Local currency The President may use payments made in local currencies under an agreement made under title I of the Food for Peace Act (7 U.S.C. 1701 et seq.) to provide assistance under this section.
